==NORMAL MODE==

== ğŸ“„ Line Navigation ==
* `h` â€“ move left one character

== ğŸ“œ Vertical Line Navigation ==
* `j` â€“ move down one line

== ğŸªœ Word Motions ==
* `w` â€“ forward to beginning of next word
* `W` â€“ forward to next WORD (non-punctuation-based)

== ğŸ“ˆ Line and Screen Motions ==
* `gg` â€“ go to first line
* `G` â€“ go to last line
* `nG` â€“ go to line `n`

== ğŸ” Search Motions ==
* `/pattern` â€“ search forward for "pattern"
* `?pattern` â€“ search backward for "pattern"
* `[[n]]` â€“ repeat last search forward
* `N` â€“ repeat last search backward
* `*` â€“ search forward for word under cursor
* `#` â€“ search backward for word under cursor
* `g*` â€“ partial match forward
* `g#` â€“ partial match backward

== ğŸ”¡ Character Search Within Line ==
* `f{char}` â€“ to next `{char}` on line
* `F{char}` â€“ to previous `{char}` on line
* `t{char}` â€“ before next `{char}` on line
* `T{char}` â€“ before previous `{char}` on line
* `;` â€“ repeat last `f`, `F`, `t`, or `T`
* `,` â€“ reverse last `f`, `F`, `t`, or `T`

== ğŸ§­ Marks and Jumps ==
* `` `a `` â€“ jump to exact position of mark `a`

== â›ï¸ Paragraph and Sentence Navigation ==

== âŒ¨ Scroll and Screen Control ==

== ğŸ”— Matching and Structural Motions ==

== ğŸ§  Jump History and Edits ==
